hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Din's Fire#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #the Lens of Truth#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #the Lens of Truth#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Din's Fire#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Zelda's Lullaby#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Bow# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Barinade#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
